name: baseline-guardrails
description: Baseline Guardrails monorepo: core engine, CLI scanner, GitHub Action

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:helpers && npm run build:cli && npm run build:action && npm run build:eslint && npm run build:lsp && npm run build:vscode
scripts.test: npm run build && npm --prefix packages/core run test && npm --prefix packages/cli run test && npm --prefix packages/action run test && npm --prefix packages/eslint-plugin-baseline run test
scripts.vsce:publish: npm run vsce:package && npm --prefix packages/vscode-extension run publish
scripts.vsce:publish:patch: npm run vsce:package && npm --prefix packages/vscode-extension run publish:patch
scripts.vsce:publish:minor: npm run vsce:package && npm --prefix packages/vscode-extension run publish:minor
scripts.vsce:publish:major: npm run vsce:package && npm --prefix packages/vscode-extension run publish:major
